rules.description: MINILA Change left command to left option f18 if alone

manipulators.description: MINILA Change left_option to f19 when used alone and left command as modifer key
MINILA Change right_application to f18 when used alone
MINILA Change right_option to f18 when used alone, and right_command as modifer key
HHKB MINILA Change left control to esc when press alone
Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone macbook only
Change right_command to f18 when used alone if not minila
Change left_command to f19 if alone if not minila
Change right_option to f17 when used alone if not minila

to.shell_command: osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchIterm" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'

osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchSafari" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchTower" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchMail" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchBearyChat" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchEmacs" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e ' tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchFinder" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument "test"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "launchReeder" in workflow "yqrashawn.workflow.launcher" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "openInMarta" in workflow "com.yqrashawn.open.in.marta" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "youdao" in workflow "whyliam.workflows.youdao"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "searchGithub" in workflow "nikivi.search-the-web" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "killProcess" in workflow "com.ngreenstein.alfred-process-killer" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "openInMarta" in workflow "com.yqrashawn.open.in.marta" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "towerRepo" in workflow "net.cjlucas.alfred.tower" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "browserTabs" in workflow "com.clintonstrong.SearchTabs" with argument "" '
